parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

overrideDetails.description: Statement would get generated both on schedule date and the date defined in statement condition for CRINTEREST DRINTEREST
Have you received Account Opening Agreement/AAA*212 from 100336}RECEIVED_NOT RECEIVED

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

accountName.description: The name of the account that is displayed

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

customerReference.description: The reference quoted by customer of the ordering account in a payment that is to be communicated to the beneficiary when a payment takes place

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.
